titleStmt.title: A letter from the most ingenious Mr. Lodowick Rhode-Island, Febr. 1, 1691-2.
titleStmt.author: Ludovici, C. (Christian), 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication, name of print and date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"A reply to Cotton Mather's Little flocks guarded against grievous wolves" -- NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Probably printed by Bartholomew Green of Boston" -- pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
